CustomField.formula: if( Charge_Group__c == 'Others' &&( Name == 'Legal Charges' || Name == 'Utilities Connection Charges' || Name == 'Society Formation Charges'|| Name == 'Infrastructure, development & club house' || Name == 'Society formation' || Name == 'Society Formation' || Name == 'Utilities connection charges' || Name == 'Legal charges'),True,False)
CustomField.label: Non Accountable Charges Checkbox
